Posts.Content: Hello, My rumors were never found on a mammogram. You should request a breast MRI. This is a very appropriate request in your situation. Hope this helps, Petra
Posts.Title: Anyone diagnosed with cancer after negative mammo and ultrasound?

Posts.Content: Dear Veronica, It's tough to be so young ad have this cancer. However, research shows now that women live longer and longer with all these treatments available. So, think positive, you are young and strong and will be able to handle many treatments out there. What medications are you on now? When we're you diagnosed? Hope you are feeling well, Petra45
Posts.Title: 26 and have Metastatic Breast Cancer to Lung
